attractions.name: Local History Museum
attractions.description: Step back in time and explore the rich history of our community through fascinating exhibits and artifacts.

attractions.name: Community Art Gallery
attractions.description: Featuring works from local artists, this gallery showcases the vibrant and diverse creative talent in our area.

attractions.name: Riverfront Park
attractions.description: A beautiful green space perfect for picnics, walking, and enjoying views of the river. Features a playground and walking trails.

attractions.name: Townsville Opera House
attractions.description: Catch a show at this historic venue. The Opera House hosts a variety of plays, concerts, and community events.

attractions.name: Farmers Market
attractions.description: Open every Saturday, the market offers fresh, locally grown produce, handmade goods, and delicious food vendors.

attractions.name: Botanical Gardens
attractions.description: Wander through diverse plant collections and tranquil landscapes. A peaceful retreat for nature lovers.

attractions.name: Children's Science Center
attractions.description: An interactive learning center where kids can explore science concepts through hands-on exhibits and experiments.

attractions.name: Historic Lighthouse
attractions.description: Overlooking the coast, this historic lighthouse offers breathtaking views and a glimpse into our maritime past.
